name: Street Farter
description:
When light clashes with it's own darkness, and only one may live on; there is no choice but to use the only weapon every man has...his gaseous farts.

In this game, you play as either the light, or the darkness, as they battle to see who is, indeed, the stinkiest of them all! You will fart, blow and hold your breath as you climb your way to victory!

A short game with instant replay-ability!

Credit to Bea Footh for all the art!

https://www.etsy.com/shop/Beacorrine

And thank you to my friend Kwinn for providing his voice and likeness!
